Beastmode

About

Digital Designer and Photographer with a passion for beautiful, meaningful design. Loves hard work, craftmanship, and making people happy. Born in South Korea, raised on a farm in Iowa, and currently residing in the Twin Cities. Lover of sports, Daft Punk, and digital media.
